channel.title: Lithuania Pk! Need development team!
channel.description: Hello guys, i have edited Hybrid pvp source and client v3 to my own server Lithuania Pk. It have a lot of bosses, minigames and more!!! So, here we are. The minigames: -Barrow minigame! -Pest control! -Gzhaar cave! -Duel arena! A lot of bosses: -Godwars! -King black dragon! -Dagannoth kings! -Tormented demons! -Corporal beast! Newest Pk armor! -Vesta! -Zuriel! -Morigan! -Statius! -Primal! -Torva! -Elite black! Full working ags spec! Zgs spec! Bgs spec! Sgs spec! Dragon claws spec! Statius hammer spec! Vls spec! And more like chaotic! Chaotic rapier! Chaotic maul! Chaotic longsword! Working turmoil! Working taste vengeance! Working soul split too! Easy training at rock crabs! Added new shop! Added few new commands like ::resetdef ::resetatt. Added a Barrow shop in quest tab. (atreyu1993 and voetball645 helped me alot!!!) So this is my server, little changed from hybrid scape v3 but I have added a few new commands for better game . I think you liked it, if you want to join my development team just pm me. :) Thank you :)

item.title: Lithuania Pk! Need development team!
item.dc:creator: @L0n3x L0n3x
item.description:
@L0n3x wrote:

Hello guys, i have edited Hybrid pvp source and client v3 to my own server Lithuania Pk.
It have a lot of bosses, minigames and more!!!
So, here we are. The minigames:
-Barrow minigame!
-Pest control!
-Gzhaar cave!
-Duel arena!
A lot of bosses:
-Godwars!
-King black dragon!
-Dagannoth kings!
-Tormented demons!
-Corporal beast!
Newest Pk armor!
-Vesta!
-Zuriel!
-Morigan!
-Statius!
-Primal!
-Torva!
-Elite black!
Full working ags spec!
Zgs spec!
Bgs spec!
Sgs spec!
Dragon claws spec!
Statius hammer spec!
Vls spec!
And more like chaotic!
Chaotic rapier!
Chaotic maul!
Chaotic longsword!
Working turmoil!
Working taste vengeance!
Working soul split too!
Easy training at rock crabs!
Added new shop!
Added few new commands like ::resetdef ::resetatt.
Added a Barrow shop in quest tab. (atreyu1993 and voetball645 helped me alot!!!)
So this is my server, little changed from hybrid scape v3 but I have added a few new commands for better game . I think you liked it, if you want to join my development team just pm me. Thank you

Read full topic
